1:
NO.CAS-8(1)/2004-DIV-I 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
“A” WING, JANPATH BHAWAN, 
JANPATH ,NEW DELHI-110001 
DATE: 14-01-05 
 
 
CIRCULAR  
 
 
SUB:    Access of AAI ferry vehicle up to the aircraft in respect of Shri Arjun  
Singh, Hon’ble minister, HRD for a period of six months. 
 
 Shri Arjun Singh, Union Minister for HRD is allowed to avail Ferry Vehicle 
facility provided by AAI during his departure and arrival by air to and from aircraft at 
all Civil Airports in the country on medical grounds, for a period of six months from 
the date of issue of this circular. 
 
  The above instruction shall be strictly complied by all concerned. 
 
 
 
 
                                                                  (R.K SINGH ) 
            ADDL. COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CA) 
 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
